<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>sn_doc.SigningSystemExtensions</api_name> <caller_access>2</caller_access> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Implements extension point sn_doc.SigningSystemExtensions</description> <name>SigningSystemExtensions</name> <script><![CDATA[var SigningSystemExtensions = Class.create(); SigningSystemExtensions.prototype = { initialize: function() { },
/** * Description: return true if this extension point is to be run * @param {string} documentTemplateTable * @return {boolean} */ handles: function(signingType) { return signingType == "servicenow_sign"; },
type: 'SigningSystemExtensions' };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-07-01 13:33:11</sys_created_on> <sys_id>8599178e5341301095f4ddeeff7b124f</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>20</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>SigningSystemExtensions</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Document Templates" source="sn_doc">6a9ea833b763330088d9bc78ee11a88q</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Document Templates">6a9ea833b763330088d9bc78ee11a88q</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8599178e5341301095f4ddeeff7b124f</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-11-11 19:12:31</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
